title: eLearning Design and Change Management Competency Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool usage skills and experience related to language education
context.additional_context: Supports adult learners in applying e-learning design and change management strategies in daily work environments. Provides education combining theory with practical cases through real-time interaction

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three research-based instructional design principles to design effective language education modules in e-learning environments.
Learners can analyze barriers to change management during e-learning adoption and propose at least two strategies to overcome them.
Learners can explain the process of measuring the effectiveness of e-learning courses and providing feedback using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
